backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with task, calendar, cooking assignment, recurring chore, and profile types plus CRUD operations guarded by access control.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of major frontend files, components, hooks, utilities, and UI behaviors for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark theme values, and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling auth flow, loading states, and rendering TodayFocus plus tabbed views for tasks, dinner rota, calendar, and people.
frontend/src/components/AddTaskDialog.ts: Dialog for creating tasks with voice dictation, actor readiness checks, error handling, and optional assignee/due date parsing.
frontend/src/components/CalendarDayPlann: Displays tasks, cooking assignments, and recurring chores for a selected day with navigation and task toggling.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Provides month, week, and day calendar views with tasks, assignments, and recurring chores, including navigation and view switching.
frontend/src/components/CalendarWeekPlan: Shows a week overview of tasks, cooking assignments, and recurring chores with navigation and task completion toggling.
frontend/src/components/DinnerRota.tsx: Manages weekly cooking assignments with editing dialogs, fairness stats, and voice dictation for meal descriptions.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing a task’s name, description, assignee, and due date with voice dictation support.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying credits and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with app branding and user menu supporting logout and principal display.
frontend/src/components/HeroHeader.tsx: Responsive header component displaying an image with optional title and subtitle overlays.
frontend/src/components/LightweightMonth: Builds a navigable monthly calendar showing tasks, cooking assignments, and recurring chores.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity with branding and a sign‑in button.
frontend/src/components/People.tsx: Manages viewing, adding, editing, and deleting person profiles with color selection and principal handling.
frontend/src/components/PersonBadge.tsx: Renders a colored badge showing a person's label with optional styling.
frontend/src/components/PersonProfileSel: Selector allowing choosing a person profile or manually entering a principal ID.
frontend/src/components/RecurringChoresD: Dialog for creating, editing, pausing, and deleting recurring chores with voice dictation support.
frontend/src/components/RecurringChoresI: Inline overview of recurring chores grouped by weekday with expand and manage actions.
frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx: Renders the main task list UI with grouping, dialogs, and actions for creating, editing, completing, and deleting tasks. Loads tasks and profiles, handles user permissions, and shows loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/TodayFocus.tsx: Displays tasks due today and the assigned cook, loading required data and showing a focused summary section. Includes a small task item component for rendering individual tasks.
frontend/src/components/VoiceDictationBu: Provides a microphone button with tooltip, disabled states, and a live listening indicator for voice dictation. Toggles between start and stop handlers and supports accessibility hints.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on the user's identity using React Query. Recreates the actor when identity changes and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithReadiness: Wraps useActor to add readiness, initialization, and error states for safely gating backend mutations. Exposes combined actor status fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, initialization, and identity persistence via AuthClient. Wraps the app with an identity provider.
frontend/src/hooks/usePeopleProfilesQuer: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting person profiles via the backend actor. Uses readiness checks and invalidates related queries on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on tasks and related backend mutations with actor readiness checks and toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeedSampleData.ts: Empty placeholder file for a future hook to seed sample data.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionStorageStat: Defines a React hook that syncs state to sessionStorage with safe read/write handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceDictation.ts: Implements a voice dictation hook using the Web Speech API with error handling, diagnostics, and transcript callbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/types/webSpeech.d.ts: TypeScript ambient definitions for the Web Speech API used by voice dictation.
frontend/src/utils/actorAvailability.ts: Utilities for checking backend actor readiness and producing user-friendly availability errors.
Provides helpers for formatting and stringifying diagnostic context during actor initialization.
frontend/src/utils/candidOption.ts: Utilities for encoding optional Candid values consistently, especially Principals.
frontend/src/utils/cookingAssignmentLabe: Functions to generate labels and colors for cooking assignments based on profiles and principals.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Structured diagnostic logging utilities for deployment and initialization steps with guidance on failures.
frontend/src/utils/fairness.ts: Computes fairness statistics for cooking assignments within various date ranges, counting occurrences per person and identifying most/least frequent cooks.
frontend/src/utils/personProfiles.ts: Provides helpers to resolve principals into display labels and colors, with fallbacks to shortened principal strings.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Implements safe principal parsing and validation utilities that return structured results instead of throwing.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoreDiagnos: Logs structured start and outcome details for recurring chore mutations with safe error stringification.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoreMutatio: Normalizes recurring chore mutation errors into user-facing messages and detailed diagnostics.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoresPrevie: Provides utilities to label timelines, group recurring chores by weekday, get upcoming chores, and map weekday values to labels.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoresSchedu: Determines whether a recurring chore should appear on a given date based on frequency rules and filters chores by date.
frontend/src/utils/taskDayKey.ts: Converts task due dates or Date objects into normalized yyyy-MM-dd day keys and provides today's day key.
frontend/src/utils/taskDueDayGrouping.ts: Groups tasks by normalized day keys, sorts them chronologically, and appends a 'no due date' group when needed.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routes), and storing, retrieving, and clearing them in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/voiceDictationDiagnos: Implements logging utilities for voice dictation lifecycle events and environment checks without exposing transcript content.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, known issues, and feature requests related to adding hero images and persistent data behavior.
